---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
fileConn <- file("output.txt")
text <- ""
for(i in 2:12) {
  if(i )
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace pflnonfarm=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd) if Date==tm(202XmX)"))
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace ub1=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd+1*rwrmse) if Date==tm(202XmX)"))
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace lb1=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd-1*rwrmse) if Date==tm(202XmX)"))
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace ub2=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd+2*rwrmse) if Date==tm(202XmX)"))
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace lb2=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd-2*rwrmse) if Date==tm(202XmX)"))
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace ub3=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd+3*rwrmse) if Date==tm(202XmX)"))
  text <- c(text, paste0("replace lb3=exp((rwrmseH", i, "^2/2)*exp(l", i, ".lnTotal+pd-3*rwrmse) if Date==tm(202XmX)\n"))
}
writeLines(text, fileConn)
close(fileConn)
```
